section.p: Becoming an initiate of Tambu gives you the benefit of paying less for blessings and other services that the temple may have to offer. It costs 60 Shards to become an initiate. You cannot become an initiate of Tambu is you are an initiate of another temple.

if.if:
If you choose to become an initiate,
write Tambu in the God box
on your Adventure Sheet - and remember to cross off the 60 Shards.
